text:
In case you’re wondering, there was an historic moment that took place yesterday afternoon. Sandra Lindsey (a city nurse) was the first person in #NewYork to get the #Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine. 

At least, she felt great after taking it... 👍👏👍

Video: @msnbc

#covid19 #vaccine https://t.co/FKjjWqeTvH
